content:
I am a student of Bedfordshire University. I am currently studying for MSc Applied Computing and Information Technology. I would be grateful if you could kindly assist and help with my final thesis and project. I am processing some information for the betterment of humanity. Please find attached a covering letter and a questionnaire. Please fill the questionnaire to the best of your ability and return to me via email: [aneta.michno@study.beds.ac.uk]
Aneta-Michnos-artificial-intelligence-questionnaire.docx
cover-letter-Msc-project.docx
This is much well appreciated as this will help me with my project. Many thanks.
